summary: Fixed 3 Typst formatting issues in bimodal-notation.typ: overset uses limits() for centered above positioning, Iff uses math.italic() for proper italics, timeshift uses limits() for LaTeX-style stacking. Document compiles successfully.

artifacts.summary: Updated 3 command definitions (Iff, overset, timeshift) to fix formatting

completion_data.completion_summary: Fixed 3 Typst formatting issues: arrow overset positioning with limits(), italic iff with math.italic(), and timeshift stacking with limits().
